segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman drying a plate, looking so focused and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, just like my mom used to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the sink, water is pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast, and she's standing right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at those kids sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that wobbly stool, reaching up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's waiting with her hand out, so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're teaming up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, all tidy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me smile, even with the little chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
